website_summaries.verdict: A great budget gaming monitor that offers a better refresh rate and sharp image than general BenQ displays.
pros: Good image quality, especially with the color contrast
Built-in flicker and blue light reduction filter
Can be used with console systems in addition to a desktop tower
cons: The screen is prone to ghosting when some image settings are set near the high end

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for consoles
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple monitors including the 4K Benq and a1440p 1ms one and read tons of reviews and this by far is the best one out there. 4K is not ready yet in spite of all the monitors out there now and all of the 1440p monitors either don't work on consoles or they have a terrible lag or picture. I came from a Benq RL2455 so I'm spoiled with the 1ms response. The picture quality is not the best out there but perfect for competitive games. You need to make sacrifices in the picture quality for now to get that great response.
customer_reviews.author: jrp510

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase for my PS4 yet
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for PS4 Ive made. All the settings are great for different game types. I had to turn UP my control sensitivity for FPS games because the better response time / input lag is very noticeable. Colors look amazing when set right. FPS mode is supposed to look washed out, but makes it easy to see other players.
customer_reviews.author: Rippentorn

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming, NOT good for designing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor to use with my PS4 and it does a great job. I play Call of Duty: Modern Warfare and the quality is great. I have attempted to use this as a second monitor for my iMac and Macbook Pro for some design work, using Adobe After Effects and Photoshop and I was disappointed. The colors on the monitor were not that great and it was definitely off, which is not acceptable for design work. So great monitor for gaming, not a great monitor for design work/ accurate colors.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: this is the best one for you
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has already exceeded my expectations since day one. If you are looking to switch from a T.V. to a gaming monitor, this is the best one for you! Switching from playing Xbox on a T.V to playing on a monitor will improve your game skills 110%. Much bigger advantage against your opponents during heated battles. If you want to play lag-free and slay noobs, get this monitor! 5 stars+++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for Xbox One.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great, but unfortunately I switched to the 24-inch because it was too big for the distance at which I sat to play Call of Duty and it gave me headaches.. I like the height adjustable stand and the swivel. The colors are also nice once you get the custom settings you desire. I like how they put the buttons on the front instead of the side, it makes it a lot easier to know which one you are pressing. This monitor also had a "Color Vibrance" setting which sort of adjusts the saturation, something that the RL2455 lacks, but it's a great feature.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Gaming Monitor

customer_reviews.title: Great but NOT EASY to change volume

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor, but my unit had panel uniformity issues

I had one issue and unfortunately it was big enough for me to return this monitor. The panel had uniformity issues. The top 1/3 of the monitor was fine, the middle 1/3 of the monitor was brighter than the rest of the panel which spanned horizontally across edge to edge. The bottom 1/3 was like the top 1/3 and appeared fine. In dark scenes you can clearly see the difference and it was distracting to me. Maybe next time BenQ!

customer_reviews.title: Never switching back to a TV!

The appearance and features of this monitor is highly in my favor. The sleek and simple look just makes you feels like a professional gamer and it is not too “showy”. The back arm of the monitor is a great addition to prevent your headphones from being lost and from being fallen. Overall the picture quality and motion blur is top-notch!

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: The BenQ 27 inch RL was the best option for my gaming setup. I've been using a 22 inch view sonic monitor for years and was skeptical at first for upgrading to 27 inches. The menu screen is easy to browse through and offers the option to save your settings. It also gives you several saved slots to save your customized settings. Finally, the setup took 5 minutes once I removed it from the box.
